title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning Through Ecosystem Balance and Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The interactions within biological communities in an ecosystem can be expressed using differential equations
The stability of food webs can be evaluated through matrix analysis based on given data
Virtual ecosystem change scenarios can be visualized as 3D models or scrapbooks using mathematical modeling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
